title: Source: Cowboys deny Bears' McCarthy request
description: The Cowboys have denied permission to the Bears to interview coach Mike McCarthy, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter on Tuesday.

title: Raiders fire Pierce; Telesco stays GM, per source
description: The Raiders fired Antonio Pierce after his first full season as head coach Tuesday, the team announced, but are retaining Tom Telesco as general manager, a source told ESPN's Adam Schefter.
author: Paul Gutierrez

title: Even Salah would struggle at Spurs - Postecoglou
description: Ange Postecoglou says even in-form Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah would find life a struggle at the moment in the Tottenham team he manages.

title: England have 'power' to boycott Afghanistan match - MP
description: England's men's players have the "power" to make their own stand and refuse to play Afghanistan in the Champions Trophy, says Labour MP Tonia Antoniazzi.

title: Power Rankings: LeBron says key to Lakers' success will be discomfort
description: There are only a few great teams in the NBA right now. Los Angeles is merely good. To be great, James says, "it takes some things that may get uncomfortable."
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Cowboys reportedly deny Bears request to interview Mike McCarthy for head coaching job
description: The Cowboys have Mike McCarthy under contract through Jan. 14.
author: Yahoo Sports

title: Sixth straight win, third in PL - are Forest on course for CL and title race?
description: These are heady days for Nottingham Forest. The last time they won this many consecutive games in the top division they were champions of Europe.

title: Potter closing in on managerial return with West Ham
description: Graham Potter is closing in on a return to football to replace Julen Lopetegui at West Ham after further positive talks with club officials.
